title: STAT+: HCA expects $1 billion hit from loss of ACA tax credits, Medicaid changes
description: HCA Healthcare put out a 2026 forecast that delighted investors, despite challenges from Medicaid and the ACA.
content: HCA Healthcare put out a 2026 forecast that delighted investors, despite challenges from Medicaid and the ACA.
